In England, in the seven days to 18 September, there were 149,754 new confirmed cases (264.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 September, there were 168,580 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 11% (18,826 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 September is 6,453,164 (11,411.4 cases per 100,000 population).
